undecided
Class ImmovableBlock

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      undecided.ImmovableBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Obstacle
public class ImmovableBlock
extends java.util.Observable
implements Obstacle

This class is the immovable object which has health (-1), a rectangle that will be used to determine object collisions, and a location. The immovable object may be created, determined if has health, receive damage, and determined if needed to be removed from the field.

Author:
Team Exception
See Also:
Obstacle, TankView, Crate, FireRing, SpikePit, TNT, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ImmovableBlock

public ImmovableBlock(Point p,
                      Map map)
This is the class constructor for the ImmovableBLock class which simply is only placed on a given map and serves no other purpose. It has health but it is assigned a value of -1 so it may never be destroyed.

Parameters:
p - location at which the immovable block is to placed
map - the map on which this immovable object is on

Parameters:
dmg - damage that this object will take

Returns:
